website_summaries.verdict: Described as the ideal travel companion that will keep your electronics charged nearly anywhere.
pros: Charges with most male USB cables
Lightweight and ergonomic, fitting most laptops and smart pads
We love that there are enough compartments to eliminate the need to carry a purse
Great for short term and extended travel
cons: May not fit underneath all airplane seats

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT UNDER SEAT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make traveling easier and to be able to just slide it under the seat in front of me. I like the suitcase, however, it DOES NOT FIT UNDER THE SEAT! I would return it but I bought it a while ago to have it for my next trip....which was just recently. Terribly disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: At least the color is nice.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance this bag had me fooled, but upon closer look I realized this was not the Samsonite quality I am accustomed to. Either the company had chosen to greatly “skimp” on material and technique, or I was sent a substandard product of some other origin. Either way, I was not happy with what’s I received and was forced to (unfortunately) send it back to Amazon. I am very unhappy about this, since I really wanted a carryon bag as smart as this one advertised itself to be, with the capabilities of being able to carry my charger, as well. Oy!
customer_reviews.author: MzKiesha

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of luggage that works well on smaller planes
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy carry-on that fits almost all overhead bins. There is only one model of airplane thus far where it didn't fit in the bin, but it does fit under the seat. The only thing that doesn't make this the perfect choice for me is the handle design. Having two loose handles that velcro together over the bag doesn't give you the leverage needed to lift the bag into the overhead bin. I have had to resort to grabbing the top of the retracted handle to be able to lift the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Small carryon with wiring for a phone battery charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this! This has a place to add a battery for charging our phones, and the charging port is outside of the bag, near the handle. It has a USB and micro USB port. It also has two straps that Velcro together to easily move around under tour buses. It fits perfectly under airline seats in the US, and overseas. It has a lot of storage area for a second set of clothes, iPad, laptop, and miscellaneous charges and cords. This even had a side pocket where I kept our itinerary for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice bag with good quality rollers. BUT, on an Alaska Airlines 737 (not max!) in the aisle seat - It didn't come close to fitting under the seat in front of me. So I had to take out what I needed and put it in the overhead. That was the whole point of buying it. :( However, I think it might fit under a middle or window seat. Not positive, but will definitely try next time. (I don't really like aisle seats anyway!) If it does fit, I'll update my review. Though it was nice to be able to roll my carry-on bag through the airport instead of carrying it. So there's that!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kirstein

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this! Does fit under plane seat - has lots of different pockets to keep things organised. You can pop a USB charger inside and charge your phone etc. from the top!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a companion to my Samsonite Silhouette Xv check luggage. I needed a carryon that had wheels and I LOVE my luggage with spinner wheels. This was Perfect for my first trip to Europe visiting my son and his family. I packed All I needed in a carryon with room to spare and Security was impressed I was Well below the weight limit for carryon!!! I highly recommend. My son impressed with ease of using these in a Busy overcrowded airport!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Neat bag
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but I do like the USB Port. Works well with laptop and files - not so much with clothes. The wheels move well and you do not have to lift the bag if the floor is slightly uneven. The double handle are great since it is easy to lift and carry the bag. Outer pockets are great to put passport, book you are reading or anything you might need easy access too. Fit under seat and was easy to put and take out of overhead compartment.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Nice carry on. Weak zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this but zipper broke before I left on my trip. I fixed it and kept it but broke on my first trip. It stayed broken the entire time. I give it 3 stars because everything else I loved. I didn't trust to get another. I went to the store and tested different types and they all use the cheap zipper and some seem more durable than others. So I probably should have tried another. It fit under all under seats accept not on the end seat on smaller planes. Did fit in middle.
customer_reviews.author: Hadessah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! It fit great under the Frontier airlines seat. It stuck forward a bit, but I still had enough room for my own feet. I love the front compartment that allows me to easily keep my 'purse' type things accessible. I also bought an Anker PowerCore 20100 for the battery. Will definitely use this for quick trips where I can get away with bringing minimal items. My daughter wants to buy the same bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Haley

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and the spinner. But did not like the vertical position for computer and binders. Also my laptop barely fit and left no room for other stuff. I was also disappointed that I had to pay almost $10 to return it. Trying to decide whether or not to keep my membership.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: A happy, much needed purchase for me.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my job. Compact and easily organized. Bringing work from office to home in this little Dynamo is perfect for me as I have difficulty carrying things without falling.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag really does fit under the seat. It is roomy and has multiple pockets. If you have a battery charger for your phone or pad the internal wiring is perfect for use. Because it has spinner wheels pushing (or pulling) it down the aisle in the plane is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: PAS456

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a EDC ( Everyday Carry) bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an everyday carry work bag. I love it. I have it in Purple. It's a deep Purple. Carrying a bag over one shoulder or a backpack was causing me great back pain. It was suggested I try one of these as an everyday work bag. I love it. Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Desdemona

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly under the seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bag. This bag is saving my shoulder when flying. No purse needed. This bag has plenty of inner pockets and a outside pocket that’s perfect for quick access of tickets or phone. I love the charger aswell. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SuzieRN

customer_reviews.title: Zipper failed on first trip, hard to give it even a 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Since I didn't return from my first trip with the luggage until after the return date was over, I could not return it. Dealing with Ebags and Samsonite has been a nightmare. I now need to take it to a store many miles away and pay to have it shipped to a repair facility. Very disappointed in Ebags, and Samsonite. The zippers are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Evans

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit under the seat of a Suncounry plane. I was so disappointed. Love the bag otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Carlsted

customer_reviews.title: Can only hold 15" computer
customer_reviews.text: Loved the case but it was too small for my 17" computer
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne North

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a 3 day work trip. Although both flights said I was in the boarding area that required my bag be checked, it fit perfectly in the tightest of overhead bins. Handle could be sturdier, hence the not full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy - Got it as a gift and was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: The underseat luggage was surprisingly lightweight, with lots of features. Got it as a gift for someone who will be doing a lot of traveling. Having under the seat luggage makes a lot of sense when airlines charge for carry-on bags. The ability to charge a phone or tablet makes it perfect for those long layovers.
customer_reviews.author: PHG

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a lighter piece of luggage. I am 67 and need something easier to lift. I looked in description of it and couldn’t find how much it weighed. It is heavy for me. Shape and color great. Just wish I had known how much it weighed.
customer_reviews.author: miraclewkr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect underseat bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had looked at so many, purchased one I didn't like for more $$, and when I got this one I noted it's perfect for my purposes! Lots of pockets, and I can probably get 3 days of stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellemarie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my travel needs. Easy access to contents and nice to have s battery backup
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is worth more like $25, not $100. The quality is very cheap,and the handle extension is very wonky and awkward, I don't think it will last for more than a season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Token zipper
customer_reviews.text: I took this carry on for my 2 week vacation and the main zipper broke on me as I was away . it became such a problem the half would close and the other half would stay open .. after a while the whole case won’t close at all .. total disappointmented
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 5 of them for our Grandchildren for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors, seem to be very sturdy, fit on top of carry on and take the place of a back pack - YEA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it claims to fit under airplane seat it did not
customer_reviews.author: by jackie(in the book)

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Easy to Move Around
customer_reviews.text: It really does fit under the airplane seat and surprisingly holds quite a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn G. Mitchard

customer_reviews.title: Wheels last only one year.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the wheels did not last a year. This was a Great bag. I use it daily as my teacher bag. But now I have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Longacre

customer_reviews.title: Im looking forward to a hassle cre trip home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, haven't used yet, but appears to roll nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy you own power backup and charge up before you hit the road.
customer_reviews.text: Fit on delta under seat. Remember to purchase your own power boost (with USB) it’s not included.
customer_reviews.author: Peggyjo

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it she travels with it, fits all her accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Samsonite Spinner Underseat Luggage
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect carry-on solution for an international trip I took.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P. Easley

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and maneuver, fit under a bus seat and airplane seat. Easy to pull out and access contents while under the seat without bothering the person in the next seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle ,held a lot , will never buy anything but a spinner again. Like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The color is great & it's very well made. I'm looking forward to taking it on a trip to LA & Tucson with multiple flights. This meets the new guidelines for carryon luggage & will force me to be efficient with what I take.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wright

customer_reviews.title: Underseat suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Lovely suitcase, but too big for my needs and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this carry on! Sturdy construction, easy to wheel, fits under the plane seats. Fits quite a bit of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lo

customer_reviews.title: Weak wheels
customer_reviews.text: One of the wheels is already broken. I use this as a work rolling bag. It has never seen an airport just the floors of my office.
customer_reviews.author: ticomama

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: I got this delivered today but it seems to be really small/ Do you happen to sell one that is a bit bigger?
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Irrgang

customer_reviews.title: Reduce the price
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase it i retuun it the price was a factor
customer_reviews.author: jerome hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and bought this to wheel from school to school. It's a great size worth plenty of pockets for everything I need to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fits well under the seat (except isle seat) as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and features especially the phone charger of this carry on. Spinner feature makes this the most versatile and the band for slipping over the handle of the larger luggage piece. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag daily for work. It’s very durable and fits my work MacBook Air and files I need to transfer. I love that it’s a spinner! Worth every penny! I look professional and I’m no longer carrying a heavy backpack.
customer_reviews.author: iEllie

customer_reviews.title: Wife uses for buisness
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for her job and she loves it . Likes the color and the weight . Seems to be sturdy , no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Samsonite Spinner Underseater with USB Port, Rolling Carry-On With Laptop Pocket - Fits 14.2 Inch Laptop - (Potent Purple)
